scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The material comes from the National War Labor Board (NWLB) files of Henry J. Meyer and consists of correspondence between Meyer and labor unions (both established and independent unions), national and regional boards of the (NWLB), the Dade County (Florida) Stabilization Panel, and the National Telephone panel. This collection is arranged into six groups of files: I. Administrative Affairs; II. Dade County Stabilization Panel; III. Established Unions and NWLB; IV. Independent Unions and the NWLB; V. National Telephone Panel; and VI. Unitd States Wage Stabilization Board. PLEASE DIRECT FURTHER INQUIRIES TO: peter.filardo@nyu.edu

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Henry J. Meyer was the United States National War Labor Board l(NWLB) iaison officer for independent unions and vice-chairman of the NWLB's National Telephone Panel.
